description: Percent of space and inodes used per filesystem.
notes: For dynamic graphs, variable metrics, the metric names should be regular expressions.
The metric_name will be replaced with the actual metric that matches
when building the graph configuration. The replacement variable for
other attributes (e.g. title) is cosi.graph_item (e.g. {{=cosi.graph_item}}) which will be replaced with the first
match '()' in the regular expression. Use the include and exclude
filters, to identify filesytems. The include/exclude arrays should
be strings which match the matched portion of the regular expression
(e.g. the part that would be used in a %VAR1% marco replacement).
matched value would be '/var'. By default every filesystem is
incuded. Exclude filtering is applied only to included filesystems.

graphs.description: % space and inodes used per filesystem
graphs.title: {{=cosi.host_name}} {{=cosi.graph_item}} %Used
